title: What a time to be alive! - ASUS ROG x EVANGELION Collection
description: Check out the OnePlus 10 Pro 5G with 12GB RAM & 256GB of storage at   Plouffe channels his inner pilot and attempts to build the ultimate ASUS ROG x Evangelion gaming PC, but does he have the NERV?  Buy ASUS ROG Maximus Z690 HERO EVA Edition:   Buy ASUS ROG Strix RTX 3090 EVA Edition GPU:   Buy ASUS ROG Strix RTX 3080 EVA Edition GPU:   Buy ASUS ROG Strix Helios EVA Edition :  Buy ASUS ROG Keris Wireless EVA Edition:   Buy ASUS ROG Delta S EVA Edition:   Buy ASUS ROG Strix Scope RX EVA Edition:   Buy ASUS ROG Thor II platinum EVA edition:   Buy ASUS ROG Strix Arion EVA edition:   Buy ASUS ROG Strix XG279Q-G GUNDAM EDITION:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something specifically for a video? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:13 Coolest PSU case ever 0:34 What is Evangelion? 1:42 Swag B^) 2:00 Shake it Plouffe! 2:19 Unboxing the case 3:03 What else do we have? 3:42 Unboxing the (wrong) monitor 4:06 PSU unboxing 4:43 Mouse and keyboard unboxing 5:39 Headphone, router, and AIO unboxing 6:48 Motherboard and unboxing 7:56 Sponsor - OnePlus 10 Pro 5G 8:37 Checking out the fully assembled PC! 10:14 Eva super fan reactions 11:41 Plouffe said WHAT?! 12:21 Outro
